data.text: @cuteculturechic We got something rise for lunch but drove by several TB and saw them advertised on the windows, I thought of you.

The blood clot is in my popliteal vein, but I have lower risk of pulmonary embolism because it is below the knee. So the ER doctor declined my medical clinic’s request for a chest CT scan to rule out PE

I’ll be starting Eloquis for the blood clot, and gabapentin to help with the awful pain in my leg. The ER doctor thinks that I’m having so much inflammation from my busted knee, the only way it can swell is up and out, impinging my popliteal/sciatic nerve.

Sorry for the delayed update! The migraine cocktail this time had double the amount of Benadryl as the last one, and it knocked me out hard. I’m home from the hospital, have had a nap, and will be heading to the pharmacy to pick up my new prescriptions a little later.
@Born2lbFat Yep, I stopped on the way home from the hospital. I demolished those suckers. https://t.co/zr1AXlBzom
@cuteculturechic Good news, I saw that Taco Bell has Nacho Fries again. 🙃
@cuteculturechic I’m so sorry!  Hang in there!!!
@cuteculturechic So sorry to hear this - get well soon.
@cuteculturechic Oh good grief! I am so sorry!! You need a break. <3
